The company's products are completely automated online, automatically matched with the location of the client to the closest supplier from its network to expedite and localize the entire process as well as gives clients an easy-to-use interface to customize, a dashboard to view and track their packaging evolution, enabling clients to easily obtain high-quality custom packaging at affordable rates.

The company's platform helps enterprise shippers to reduce logistics spending and save time with quoting, booking, management, and analysis of on-demand air, ocean, parcel, rail, and road shipments from their private pool of logistics providers, enabling clients to manage on-demand freight effectively.

description: Operator of a medical supplies marketplace intended to connect medical distributors with affordable medical device manufacturers. The company provides access to difficult-to-source supplies that make it faster, easier, and more affordable to address points of friction that exist between buyers and sellers of medical products through e-catalog and supporting services like logistics, enabling healthcare equipment suppliers to connect with a network of verified local distributors.

name: LOOLY'S PBC
description: Producer of plant-based food products intended to re-engineer preventative healthcare facilities. The company's products are prepared through peer-reviewed research to determine the nutrition goals of each menu that are available in software-enabled mobile cupboards placed at company lobbies, hospitals, bus stations, and universities, enabling consumers to get their nutritional needs fulfilled through fresh, nutritional, and affordable meals.

name: Zeew LTD
description: Developer of an online business development software designed to help businesses launch their digital platform immediately. The company's software has a variety of features that include category management, customer management, payment integration, instant order notification, and restaurant owner settings, enabling restaurants, pharmaceuticals, and other businesses to get a seamless online ordering and delivery experience.

name: Zest Inc.
description: Developer of resource scheduling software intended to help manage nursing visits and long-term and medical care visits. The company's platform specializes in automatically generating an optimal visit route to reduce travel and creates an optimized schedule to increase calls in vacant time, enabling caregivers to reduce the work time and travel time required for visits and at the same time lead to an increase in sales by increasing the number of visits.

name: Erply Limited
description: Provider of cloud-based point of sale and inventory management software designed to help retailers to focus more on business and less on IT. The company's point of sale and inventory management software handles data across physical shops, online stores and offices along with real-time dashboards with relevant data, enabling clients to use a cost effective and technologically superior way for handing centralized management experience.

name: Mailhaven Inc.
description: Developer of a mailbox application designed to track packages. The company's mailbox application permits managing of online purchases and automated tracking of shipments, enabling users to simplify package tracking.

name: Whiplash Merchandising Inc.
description: Developer of an e-commerce software designed to offer order management and warehouse management services. The company's e-commerce software offers integration, order management system (OMS) as well as warehouse management system (WMS) capabilities to emerging brands along with real-time visibility and OMS capabilities, labor management and order fulfillment services, enabling companies to enhance their operations with expanded customer offerings and responsiveness.

name: DropShip Commerce
description: Provider of a cloud-based drop-shipping platform designed to provide product push and predictive supply chain, models. The company's online platform integrates and manages drop ship partners, inventory, data, and orders by handling the exchange of data through a single connection and integration point, helping trading partners streamline operations, generate more sales, and fulfill more orders using the virtual supply chain.

name: Deal Connect Inc.
description: Developing a logistics optimization service for scrap metal industry

name: Kinnek, Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace for high-cost purchases designed to find suppliers and manage purchasing. The company's online marketplace for high-cost purchases offers a curated way to research equipment or supplies, enabling businesses to seamlessly connect with suppliers.

name: Skootar Co Ltd
description: Developer of an online courier service booking platform designed to deliver goods and parcels in a convenient and reliable way. The company's online courier service booking platform matches the customer's request for document, parcel and food delivery with on-demand motorbike messenger and delivers the packages in a single trip, enabling customers to design their document workflow routes and get their things delivered quickly.

name: TradeGecko Pte Ltd
description: Provider of a cloud-based inventory management software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform intended to automate and reduce workflow inefficiencies. The company's platform integrates front-end e-commerce and POS software with back-end accounting and shipping software, enabling SMBs to manage their inventory efficiently, process orders quickly and change the pricing of their products dynamically.

name: TaskRabbit, Inc.
description: Provider of an online mobile marketplace designed to help individuals and small businesses outsource their tasks and deliveries. The company's online mobile marketplace matches freelance labor with local demand, enabling users to find immediate help with everyday tasks, including cleaning, moving, delivery and handyman work.

description: Provider of an online inventory management application intended to simplify businesses. The company offers a web-based platform and mobile application that simplifies processes for distributors and retailers with inventory management integrations.

name: HubLogix, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud-based e-commerce platform intended to integrate, manage and optimize merchandise sales. The company's cloud-based e-commerce platform connects inventory management services, third-party logistics providers and wholesale distributors to provide a seamless link from an e-commerce platform to one or many fulfillment points to automate inventory, orders and shipment updates enable retailers and branded manufacturers to work in a flexible way.
